message.raw:
* segway/layer.py: refactor into new Segmentation class

* segway/run.py (set_option): keep setting when it has numeric value
of zero
(Runner.fromoptions): don't prematurely memoize num_worlds if tied_tracknames is empty

* test/segway_layer/touchstone/segway.layered.bed: fix touchstone
